keys.name: SIMPLE
keys.title: Data conform to FITS standard
keys.description: The SIMPLE keyword is required to be the first keyword in the primary header of all standard FITS files and is not permitted in extention headers. The value shall contain a logical constant with the value T if the file conforms to this standard.

keys.name: BITPIX
keys.title: bits per data value
keys.description: The value field shall contain an integer that specifies the number of bits that represent a data value in the associated data array. BITPIX = 0 for the primary header. For an image extension, 16 is uncalibrated and -32 is calibrated. For group information captured in an ASCII table extension BITPIX = 8, denoting that the array contains ASCII characters.

For an image extension, 16 is uncalibrated and -32 is calibrated. For group information captured in an ASCII table extension BITPIX = 8, denoting that the array contains ASCII characters.
